Today, Gower is lighting up with 4ft @9s WSW swell and light S winds at 9 mph. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are both prime spots, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 3ft @11s with light WNW winds, still providing fun waves at various locations. Day after, expect a return to 4ft @8s with SSE winds, keeping the surf lively. Best: today.
